name: You're in a Dark Room
description:
Crafted over the course of November 2021, we have You're in a Dark Room!

Think text-based adventure, but instead of typing out your inputs, you click buttons instead, and each combination of buttons differs, depending on the previous action!

This is very much an "early stage" project, but we figured releasing this as part of the #CrunchlessChallenge was worthwhile!

Worth noting that there are a few buttons which don't yet have script elements attached to them, and that the Linux build for this has not yet been tested, so if things break when attempting to run in Linux, that would be why.

Controls

Left-Click to click buttons, shouldn't need much more than that, maybe Alt + F4 if you have gotten yourself stuck somewhere.

Borrowed Assets

Custom Font for use throughout the game:
https://www.1001fonts.com/vt323-font.html

The Devs

  • Taronia Gamenstein as the Programmer/Godot Engine Driver
  • James_T_Ripper as the Graphics Designer/Story Craftsmen/Idea Guy

This was built using the following software;

  • Blender
  • Godot
  • Krita
  • Notepad++
